Text: SEED PLEASE! I have limited bandwidth, so I try not to upload new movies until there's at least 5 full seeds. I have LOTS more classic movies to up, so if you like my work please help out and seed, which saves me from having to seed old uploads. Thanks!
Thanks, but man is that watermark annoying.  Love to see this movie in highres without one.
mt_phile, I agree. Unfortunately most of the HDTV rips have a logo of some sort. Not much I can do about that. I don't have time to blur out each and every one, and that too could be distracting.
